name: S3Upload
description: Build task to upload a file to an S3 bucket in AWS.
author: Marcus Felling

inputs.name: BucketName
inputs.label: Bucket Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the S3 Bucket

inputs.name: File
inputs.label: File(s) to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory of file to upload. For multiple files, use comma delimited list (no spaces). Example: $(Build.SourcesDirectory)/examplefile1.txt,$(Build.SourcesDirectory)/examplefile1.txt

inputs.name: Key
inputs.label: Name of S3 Object(s) (Key)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name and directory that the corresponding file will have in Amazon S3. For multiple files, use comma delimited list (no spaces). Example: S3FolderName/examplefile1-uploaded.txt,S3FolderName/examplefile2-uploaded.txt
